mapper.select: select id, user_id, telecommand_name, equipment_id, parameter, time, operation_feedback from mcs.t_telecommand_log where id = #{id}
select id, user_id, telecommand_name, equipment_id, parameter, time, operation_feedback from mcs.t_telecommand_log limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into mcs.t_telecommand_log(user_id, telecommand_name, equipment_id, parameter, time, operation_feedback) values (#{userId}, #{telecommandName}, #{equipmentId}, #{parameter}, #{time}, #{operationFeedback})
mapper.update:
update mcs.t_telecommand_log
user_id = #{userId},
telecommand_name = #{telecommandName},
equipment_id = #{equipmentId},
parameter = #{parameter},
time = #{time},
operation_feedback = #{operationFeedback},
where id = #{id}
